document.full_text: no matter which of the four remaining teams ends up coming out on top over the next few weeks, the next n.b.a. champion will not feature a big man who is a true post-up scoring threat.
document.title: where have the big men gone in the playoffs?
lines_and_colors: no matter which of the four remaining teams ends up coming out on top over the next few weeks, the next n.b.a. champion will not feature a big man who is a true post-up scoring threat.
